author: Charley Grant
title: How Missed Red Flags Derailed a Drug Deal
text:
A bombshell revelation seems likely to derail a generic-drugs merger. Investors could have avoided the mess altogether by taking some red flags more seriously.

German health-care company Fresenius SE said Monday it was investigating “alleged breaches of [Food and Drug Administration] data integrity requirements” at generics-drug manufacturer Akorn, which Fresenius agreed to purchase last year for $3.7 billion. For their part, Akorn said in a statement that its own investigation “has not found any facts that would result in...
